Rich,
All that I can make out is tadashige.  As you no doubt already know
t=
here were both Joshu Umetada Tadashige and Shigemasa working in about
the r=
ight time period.  The workmanship looks right for Umetada.

I don't know m=
uch about Goshu Hikone Tadashige, but at least some of
his work is in class=
ic Soten style.  I can't say that I've seen
Soten/Hikone work in the style =
of your tsuba.
